snippet: A defense psychologist argued that Mr. Pistorius should be hospitalized rather than imprisoned: “His condition is severe.”
abstract: Defense psychologist asserts that Oscar Pistorious, South African double-amputee Olympic runner who shot his girlfriend Reeva SteenKamp to death in 2013, is unfit to testify at his murder sentencing; details Pistorious' mental health amid skeptical questioning from prosecutors.
lead_paragraph: A defense psychologist argued that Mr. Pistorius should be hospitalized rather than imprisoned: “His condition is severe.”

headline.main: Oscar Pistorius Is Unfit to Testify at Sentencing, Psychologist Says
headline.print_headline: Pistorius Is Unfit to Testify at His Murder Sentencing, a Psychologist Says
